snippet: Davis Freeman’s “Too shy to stare,” an installation performance in which audience members participate in unexpected ways, is part of Performance Space 122’s Coil Festival.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews production of performance art piece Too shy to stare, directed by Davis Freeman, at the Old School as part of Performance Space 122's Coil Festival.
lead_paragraph: Davis Freeman’s “Too shy to stare,” an installation performance in which audience members participate in unexpected ways, is part of Performance Space 122’s Coil Festival.

headline.seo: ‘Too Shy to Stare,’ a Davis Freeman Installation Performance - Review
headline.main: Sitting and Drinking and Flirting and Pondering Life With Your Multiple Selves
headline.print_headline: Sitting and Drinking and Flirting and Pondering Life With Your Multiple Selves
